医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调护理的情感损失苏黎世大学基于三个国家 28,000 多名护理人员的数据进行的新研究表明，无论护理环境如何，个人照顾亲人的时间越长，他们的福祉受到的影响就越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-highlights-the-emotional-toll-of-caregiving.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-highlights-the-emotional-toll-of-caregiving.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=909bf5d1-971c-487b-8840-12387e664461 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:50:00 -0500 Research highlights the emotional toll of caregiving
胰岛素抵抗与主动脉瓣狭窄风险增加有关一项针对 45 岁以上男性的大型新人群研究表明，胰岛素抵抗可能是世界上最常见的心脏瓣膜疾病——主动脉瓣狭窄 (AS) 的重要危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Insulin-resistance-linked-to-increased-risk-of-aortic-stenosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Insulin-resistance-linked-to-increased-risk-of-aortic-stenosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c48daa24-8b65-42b8-a972-4e78af66a2ec Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:22:38 -0500 Insulin resistance linked to increased risk of aortic stenosis
女性唾液可以提供怀孕期间压力和心理健康的线索密歇根州立大学的新研究发现，孕妇唾液中微生物的数量和类型根据她们是否承受生活压力以及焦虑、抑郁和创伤后应激障碍的症状而有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Womane28099s-saliva-could-offer-clues-to-stress-and-mental-health-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Womane28099s-saliva-could-offer-clues-to-stress-and-mental-health-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3469920d-67e3-4c82-a6d3-74abb9aa6e40 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:13:44 -0500 Woman’s saliva could offer clues to stress and mental health during pregnancy
探索睡眠在不同性别血压调节中的作用您可能听说过睡眠被描述为对身体的神奇药丸。只要数量、时间和质量都正确，它就能产生奇迹——增强免疫系统、改善血糖，甚至降低心脏病和中风的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Exploring-sleeps-role-in-blood-Pressure-regulation-across-genders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Exploring-sleeps-role-in-blood-Pressure-regulation-across-genders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d81e92f-28f0-41fb-a490-05762d484b96 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 05:53:11 -0500 Exploring sleep's role in blood pressure regulation across genders
一名幼儿接受了鼻拭子测试，但在去看医生之前就离开了。账单是 445 美元。去年 12 月的一个晚上，瑞安·维特斯坦·瑙曼 (Ryan Wettstein Nauman) 伤心欲绝。这位来自伊利诺伊州皮奥里亚的三岁女孩被放在床上后，一直哭啊哭啊哭，没有什么能让她平静下来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/A-toddler-got-a-nasal-swab-test-but-left-before-seeing-a-doctor-The-bill-was-24445。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/A-toddler-got-a-nasal-swab-test-but-left-before-seeing-a-doctor-The-bill-was-24445。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=080ef4c8-97c6-4f82-a4a8-bb394722aa70 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 05:39:52 -0500 A toddler got a nasal swab test but left before seeing a doctor. The bill was $445.
SoTILT3D 成像平台揭示纳米级细胞相互作用由莱斯大学 Anna-Karin Gustavsson 领导的一个研究小组开发了一种创新的成像平台，有望提高我们对纳米尺度细胞结构的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Nanoscale-cellular-interactions-unveiled-by-the-SoTILT3D-imaging-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Nanoscale-cellular-interactions-unveiled-by-the-SoTILT3D-imaging-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d07be746-9389-45c6-966a-5833a4459158 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 02:31:19 -0500 Nanoscale cellular interactions unveiled by the SoTILT3D imaging platform
揭示 INST10 在神经发育和细胞识别中的作用Wistar 研究所的 Alessandro Gardini 博士和实验室为某些生物过程如何决定神经细胞的发育提供了新的线索。他们对分子“桥”复合体的发现证明了对早期神经发育的理解达到了新的细节水平：这对于进一步了解神经发育综合征至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Unveiling-INST10s-role-in-neural-development-and-cell-identity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Unveiling-INST10s-role-in-neural-development-and-cell-identity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30a92d3c-75a9-4e2d-8793-54ec767b512d Wed, 27 Nov 2024 02:12:51 -0500 Unveiling INST10's role in neural development and cell identity
研究将细胞死亡途径与癌症抵抗力和生长联系起来一项新的研究发现了癌细胞逃避免疫系统的一种意想不到的方式，使治疗更难发挥作用。这项发表在《癌细胞》杂志上的研究解释了一种癌细胞死亡实际上如何通过关闭免疫系统对抗癌症的能力而使肿瘤生长得更快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Study-links-cell-death-pathway-to-cancer-resistance-and-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Study-links-cell-death-pathway-to-cancer-resistance-and-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa74c573-c411-4464-9d9b-43766d620fee Wed, 27 Nov 2024 02:06:51 -0500 Study links cell death pathway to cancer resistance and growth
少量增加体力活动可促进健康长寿格里菲斯大学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，如果美国人口中的每个人都像前 25% 的人一样活跃，那么 40 岁以上的人的寿命可以延长 5 年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Small-increases-in-physical-activity-could-promote-healthy-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Small-increases-in-physical-activity-could-promote-healthy-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42c9121f-cd2a-4f3d-87c6-4a87d65d444e Wed, 27 Nov 2024 02:06:19 -0500 Small increases in physical activity could promote healthy longevity
基于胭脂树的创新疗法有望治疗小儿口臭巴西研究人员的一项研究表明，蓝光针对胭脂树色素的抗菌光动力疗法是治疗口呼吸儿童口臭的可行且有效的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Innovative-annatto-based-therapy-shows-promise-for-treating-pediatric-halitosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Innovative-annatto-based-therapy-shows-promise-for-treating-pediatric-halitosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f34449b5-a577-421a-804c-e4badf412d22 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 02:02:25 -0500 Innovative annatto-based therapy shows promise for treating pediatric halitosis
